body.name: Cozy Castle Black Small Bookshelf, Wood 8 Cube Storage Organizer Book Shelves with Anti-Tilt Device, Freestanding Modern Bookcase for Bedroom, Office, Living Room
features: 【Saving Space】Small Bookshelf for small spaces. It is the optimal choice for home lovers, which can reduce clutter and create a neat, beautiful and comfortable living environment for your home. With different sizes of Cubes, this bookshelf can meet your different storage needs.

【Various Uses】With its timeless elegant design, this Cube Storage Organizer satisfies both aesthetic and functional storage requirements. In addition, it can be used not only as a bookshelf, but also as a kitchen cabinet, filing cabinet and general storage cabinet that can be placed anywhere in the room. Importantly, Designed with an anti-tilt device, this bookcase creates a safe environment for your family.

【CARB Certification】CARB Phase 2 compliant: National standard in the U.S. instituted by the California Air Resources Board (CARB) to reduce formaldehyde emissions. Our panel of the Bookcase certified by CARB with formaldehyde emission below 0.09ppm. Therefore, this Small Bookshelf is suitable for families with children and pets and has no nagative effect on health.

【Easy Cleaning & Assembly】Thanks to the smooth, scratch-resistant and waterproof surface of this Small Bookshelf, you can simply wipe away stains with a damp cloth. Moreover, the certain height above the floor also makes it easier to clean. Besides, according to the detailed instructions, this bookcase is easy to assemble.

【Dimensions】Overall Dimension of the Small Bookcase: 31.50" W x 11.61" D x 36.92" H; Smaller shelf dimensions: 9.68" W x 11.22" D x 9.72" H; Larger shelf dimensions: 9.64" W x 11.22" D x 14.86" H. Our Cozy Castle is your 365-day good companion for any problem. Any question? Please do not hesitate to let us know and solve them.
body.description: Cozy Castle Black Small Bookshelf Freestanding Modern Design There are 8 Open Cubes in different sizes to provide you with plenty of storage space for your maximum storage needs. It can be used not only as a bookshelf, but also as a display cabinet, file cabinet and general storage cabinet that can be placed in bedrooms, living rooms and offices. Color: White & Black Material: Solid High Quality Wood Board & Metal Hardware Overall Dimension: 11.61 " D x 31.5 " W x 36.93 " H Certified by CARB: formaldehyde-free, green

It can be used not only as a bookshelf, but also as a display cabinet, file cabinet and general storage cabinet that can be placed in bedrooms, living rooms and offices. Bookcase with High Quality Panel High-quality panels give you a more durable and solid product experience. Waterproof & Scratch-resistant & Easy to clean Bookshelf with Anti-Tilt Design An anti-tip device provides the safety protection for your family. Take the worry off your mind and create a safe living environment. Storage Cabinet with Solid Legs 4 solid wood legs not only can strongly support the storage cabinet, but also make the style of the home more fresh and beautiful. The certain height from the floor also makes it easier to clean and find small things that roll to the corner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Super cute and easy to assemble. Looks just like the picture and decent size . You could place 2 of them next to each or however . Decent price .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: VERY impressed with the packaging and instructions, very easy to put together!it’s super cute, sturdy & worth the buy!!was exactly what i was looking for!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect in my living room
reviews.reviewText: I'm a pretty handy over 70 female, so this was not a difficult project. I do wish, however, that the picture instructions were a bit more clear. I'm still not sure if I put the metal leg holders on correctly, but it seemed the logical way to go and it worked. Overall, the bookcase seems sturdy and the shelves are strong enough to hold my books. The look matches my other decor, and I'm very happy with the piece. I can recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice for holding game consoles for TV
reviews.reviewText: Using it as a bedroom entertainment shelf and it works great! I wish there were more holes pre-made/pop-out in the backing to run cables if needed. Nice piece!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy assemly; good quality
reviews.reviewText: Clear instructions; good quality; filled with books it’s still sturdy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Usual quality for this price point.
reviews.reviewText: Instructions were easy to follow, put it together myself. No parts missing. No chips/ nicks. Holes are covered with stickers.Be careful with the end caps! Once they are in there they are not coming out- at least not without damage 😉TookAbout 2 hours for a single person to build.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This bookcase/ display case is just great. It took less than 2 hours to put together using the instructions provided. Hardware was all there in the box, everything else was packaged well no scratches or chips. Looks nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect corner cabinet
reviews.reviewText: Just like the picture. At first I was really worried how the quality would be but it’s actually a very nice wood cabinet. Super cute for plants books and other decor that my house was missing, made it more “homey”
